entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Bachelors Island

entry.title: Sunday: Clearing. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 4 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 30 km/h in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 05 February 2023
